value.content:
## ailogとは

atprotoと連携するサイトジェネレータ。

## ailogの使い方

```sh
$ git clone https://git.syui.ai/ai/log
$ cd log
$ cat public/config.json
{
  "title": "syui.ai",
  "handle": "syui.syui.ai",
  "collection": "ai.syui.log.post",
  "network": "syu.is",
  "color": "#0066cc",
  "siteUrl": "https://syui.ai"
}
---
$ npm run dev
```

## ailogのコンセプト

1. at-browserを基本にする
2. atproto oauthでログインする
3. ログインしたアカウントで記事をポストする
value.title: ailogを作り直した

en.content:
## What is ailog?

A site generator that integrates with atproto.

## How to use ailog

```sh
$ git clone https://git.syui.ai/ai/log
$ cd log
$ cat public/config.json
{
  "title": "syui.ai",
  "handle": "syui.syui.ai",
  "collection": "ai.syui.log.post",
  "network": "syu.is",
  "color": "#0066cc",
  "siteUrl": "https://syui.ai"
}
---
$ npm run dev
```

## ailog's concept

1. Based on at-browser as its foundation
2. Logs in via atproto oauth
3. Allows users to post articles using their logged-in account
en.title: recreated ailog
